review: Changed my life. Casting has helped peel my household off of network TV and into the interactive world that had been limited to our devices.
author: Jason M Olivero

review: I love the functionality of this device,video quality is good, the popularity of this has spawned useful apps and extensions that adds more to its capabilities. It may have a bit of a delay from source, but its synced (audio and video) & it doesn't show mouse cursor and a slight delay while navigating. I am optimistic that software supporting this will get better in the future.
author: Gene Picker

review: Very Handy Device.  But, kinda limited, in that you need to control it from another device.
author: CMDiazJr

review: For what it does, i like it a lot. Use it on my other tv.
author: Mike Churchwell

review: Its very easy to set up and it streams perfectly with all google devices. I live it because I can cast my cell phone, computer, my music, Netflix, YouTube and Pandora without the need of a smart TV.
author: Juan M. Jimenez "juanmajalos"

review: this is probably one of the best invention.
author: Nathaniel Jianshun Ng "Nathaniel Ng"
